items.title: Lenovo’s already-affordable 2025 Tab One Android tablet with folio case is down to $100 for fall Prime Day
items.summary:
While you can still grab Lenovo’s Tab M11 11-inch Android tablet for $130 today as part of the ongoing Prime Big Deal Day sale, we just spotted another deal that gets you yet another budget-friendly model at a solid price. Amazon currently has Lenovo’s latest 2025 Tab One Android tablet with folio case down at $99.99 shipped. This particular unit debuted earlier this year carrying a $160 price tag, and it’s now seeing a $60 discount. We saw this one drop to $110 last month, but today’s deal at Amazon shaves an additional $10 off its usual going rate to mark the best price we have tracked for it to date. What’s particularly worth noting here is that the Amazon listing includes a folio case for just $5 more than Lenovo’s current offer of $94.99 shipped (with promo code EXTRAFIVE) for just the tablet alone without the case. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Amazon now offering a wild $490 off Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge for Prime Day, more
items.summary:
Amazon is not playing around with the Samsung Galaxy smartphone deals for Prime this year. It already knocked a giant $415 off Galaxy Z Fold 7, the Galaxy Z Flip 7 is at new all-time lows with $315 in savings, and Galaxy S25 Ultra is up to $390 off. But we wanted to highlight the deal on its ultra-thin Galaxy S25 Edge as well – it quickly went out of stock yesterday but you can once again score a wild $490 off right now.

items.title: Get or give a jump with NOCO’s Boost Plus 1000A starter and 6,486.48Wh power bank at $80 annual low (Reg. $100)
items.summary:
As part of its Prime Big Deal Days, Amazon is offering the NOCO Boost Plus GB40 1000A Ultra-Safe Jump Starter at $79.96 shipped. It spent most of 2025 keeping to its $100 full price, with discounts over the year (coming in more frequent waves in recent months) having taken costs down as low as $80 normally, with a one-time drop to the $60 low back at the end of August that lasted only a few hours. Aside from that short-term deal, you’re otherwise looking at the next-best rate of the year, saving you $20 and giving you a versatile means to jump-start vehicles, as well as personal devices. There’s also our hands-on tested review that will give you an even more in-depth look at what to expect, or just head below. You can also shop the brand’s entire lineup of jump starters in its official Amazon storefront here.

items.title: Here’s how to score Lenovo’s (2025) Legion Go S Windows handheld for $394 at Amazon for Prime Day (Reg. $650)
items.summary:
Amazon has been rolling out some solid deals on gaming gear — including laptops, desktops, and more — as part of its ongoing Prime Big Deal Days sale. If you’ve been eyeing a gaming handheld, Amazon Resale has Lenovo’s 2025 Legion Go S Windows handheld going for as low as $393.70 shipped in “Like New” condition, with a 35% Prime-only discount that automatically applies at checkout. Simply head to this link right here and add the “Used – Like New” listing to the cart from the sidebar. That’s a hefty $256 off its $650 regular price and the lowest we’ve seen so far. For reference, the brand-new model isn’t discounted at the moment, and they’re all fetching their full prices even at Best Buy, where we typically see them get a discount. Head below for more details.

items.summary:
Amazon’s Prime Day M4 MacBook Air deals are live and quite notable at up to $230 off the list prices, the M4 MacBook though…not so much. You can land a solid discount on the base model M4 MBP, but after seeing solid $300 discounts for a couple months and reports suggesting stock is dwindling at Apple stores, options are thin right now. That said, if you’re looking to land a huge deal on a MacBook Pro and don’t mind a previous-gen version, Best Buy is offering up to $800 off the original list prices right now on select M3 Pro configs as part of its Techtober sale.

It fetches $849 these days without any discounts, which we’ve seen taken as low as $699 over the year. The 22% Prime markdown here cuts $190 off the tag for the best new price we have tracked, giving you a handy means to prepare for snowier months ahead. Of course, if you want something even more powerful, you can find the 24-inch Cordless Self-Propelled Two-Stage Electric Snow Blower with two 7.5Ah batteries at $1,349.99 shipped, down from $1,650.

The Kajang–Seremban Expressway (LEKAS) will be temporarily closed due to the RHB LEKAS Highway Ride 2025 cycling event happening the weekend of 11 and 12 October. As per the highway concessionaire, the closure is intended to ensure a safe route for participants throughout the night cycling event. The closure will begin at 5PM on Saturday […]

items.title: Official AirPods fall Prime Day deals now live from $89, AirPods Max $120 off, more
items.summary:
As part of its early Prime Big Deal Days, Amazon has now officially unleashed its discounts on Apple’s AirPods lineup. While we are still awaiting a price drop on the new AirPods Pro 3, both AirPods 4 sets are now back at the best prices ever and AirPods Max is now $120 off in all five colors.

items.title: Google’s Pixel 9a now at $349 Prime Day all-time low ($150 off), Pixel 9 Pro/XL models up to $350 off
items.summary:
The entire lineup of 2025 Pixel 10 smartphone are now at the best prices yet for Prime Big Deal Days, as well as the Pixel 9a down at the $349 Amazon all-time low, but there are also some deep deals on the previous-gen 9 series devices. The Pixel 9a remains the latest entry-level “a” series model – it has now dropped $150, as you’ll know from our coverage yesterday. But those looking to save a buck on the previous pro-grade handsets can now do so as part of the fall Prime Day sale – Pixel 9 Pro/XL models are now up to $350 off. 

more…

items.title: Microsoft delays last week's 50% price hike for existing Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers in Germany, Ireland, South Korea, Poland, India, and other markets (Tom Warren/The Verge)
items.summary:
Tom Warren / The Verge:
Microsoft delays last week's 50% price hike for existing Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers in Germany, Ireland, South Korea, Poland, India, and other markets  —  Current subscribers in some European countries won't be affected by Microsoft's Game Pass price hikes just yet.

items.title: Add 1TB storage to your PC or PS5 for just $65 this Prime Day with Lexar’s heatsink SSD down to 2025 low
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Prime Big Deal Days sale, Amazon is offering Lexar’s 1TB NM790 heatsink SSD for $64.88 shipped. This is regularly a $95 drive, which is now seeing a solid $30 discount. Today’s 32% offer marks the lowest price we have tracked for it this year, and it’s now within $14 of its all-time low price. You can also get this SSD in 2TB and 4TB capacities, both of which are down to their lowest prices of the year right now at $109.88 and $219.88 shipped, respectively. Head below for more details.

more…

According to Digital Minister Gobind Singh Deo, this coordinated effort involves the Ministry of […]

items.summary:
